item.title: Blending Mongo and RDBMS for ecommerce
item.description: Justin Hileman and I presented at MongoNYC 2011 to a packed house. Our presentation outlines both why someone would want to use MongoDB for ecommerce and how we overcame some of itâ€™s limitations by incorporating mysql into our infrastructure. Presenting at MongoNYC 2011 Blending MongoDB and RDBMS for ecommerce View more presentations from Steve Francia.
